comment: This curriculum is so easy that they have to find ways to make people fail. The Bio lab reports will be quite strict so really read the rubric. She's really caring and reasonable in class. She will guide you to the A by stating exam material. Be sure you do well on the free response questions on test 1 because they will be a hefty part of the grade

Erica is a grad student. I had her for BioL 1107 and I loved her! She is willing to help and is very approachable. She does grade the lab reports a little harshly at times, so just make sure to not write them at the last minute. But I would take her again!
